document_data.name: Jhalass Huntsilver
document_data.dobnotes: This date is obviously in error because it would mean that she gave birth to her first child at four years old. Possible explanations include: her birth year is off by a decade, or perhaps it was given in [[Dalereckoning]] instead of Cormyr Reckoning in this one instance.
document_data.mainbody: '''Jhalass Huntsilver''' was a queen of [[Cormyr]] and the wife of King [[Dhalmass Obarskyr]], who ruled from [[1210 DR]] to [[1227 DR]]. She was the mother of King [[Palaghard Obarskyr II|Palaghard II]].
document_data.Relations: A member of the [[Huntsilver]] family, Jhalass was the wife of King Dhalmass Obarskyr. They had four children: [[Proster Obarskyr (prince)|Proster]] (born [[1213 DR]], died [[1222 DR]], aged 9), [[Palaghard Obarskyr II|Palaghard]] (born [[1214 DR]]), [[Elliira Obarskyr|Elliira]] (born [[1218 DR]]), and [[Pelara Obarskyr|Pelara]] (born [[1220 DR]]).
document_data.History: After the port city of Marsember rebelled, King Dhalmass seized it back in the [[1227 DR|Year of the Wall, 1227 DR]].
